law.catch_line: Unlawful acts relating to purchase or disposition of metals -- Penalty.

text.section: A person is guilty of unlawful acts relating to purchase or disposition of metals when the person violates any provision of KRS 433.890 other than the recordkeeping provisions.

A person guilty of unlawful acts relating to the purchase or disposition of metals shall be fined not more than one hundred dollars ($100) or imprisoned in the county jail for not more than thirty (30) days, or both.

law.history: Created 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 83, sec. 3, effective July 15, 2008.
